PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-15312009-09-09,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActTrust and Loan Companies Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Cost of Borrowing (Trust and Loan Companies) Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE COST OF BORROWING (Trust and Loan Companies) REGULATIONS to improve the transparency of disclosures, the amendments require that all disclosure under the regulations be made in a manner that is clear, concise and not misleading.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0260 Publication Date: 2009-09-30
